headline.main: Nigeria Charges Shell, Eni With Corruption in Oil Bloc Sale
headline.print_headline: Nigeria Charges Shell, Eni With Corruption in Oil Bloc Sale

lead_paragraph: Nigeria has filed criminal charges of corruption against oil multinationals Royal Dutch Shell and Eni over the $1.1 billion sale of one of Africa's richest oil blocks.
snippet: Nigeria has filed criminal charges of corruption against oil multinationals Royal Dutch Shell and Eni over the $1.1 billion sale of one of Africa's richest oil blocks....
